content: The Mountain Patroller is accessible in the very early stages of Chapter 3. To find him, head up the Frost-Clad Path to reach the temple at the top of the hill. Fight the Macaque Chief for the first time, then head up the stairs on the left side of the temple. Follow the path to the end to find the Mountain Patroller.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mountain_Patroller_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Mountain Patroller Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Mountain Patroller Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Mountain Patroller is accessible in the very early stages of Chapter 3. To find him, head up the Frost-Clad Path to reach the temple at the top of the hill. Fight the Macaque Chief for the first time, then head up the stairs on the left side of the temple. Follow the path to the end to find the Mountain Patroller.
